item.title: Report X-2023100205
item.description:
Report X-2023100205

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-01T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-22
  • City: SALINE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023100205 SequenceEvent: Cap came loose on one bottle of formula 83 clearing solvent. QA was notified when damage became apparent and the package was placed in a plastic hazardous materials bin. DescribePack: 1 loose cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA was notified when damage became apparent and the package was placed in a plastic hazardous materials bin. 2. X-2023100349 SequenceEvent: The package was discovered to be wet along the bottom of the box and brought to QA. DescribePack: The bottles are leaking along the bottom seam due to faulty containers. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a plastic bag and bin to contain the leak.

item.title: Report X-2023082081
item.description:
Report X-2023082081

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-03T00:35:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-26
  • City: ROMULUS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During the morning sort at our ramp location in Romulus MI, a plastic Jerrican was punctured containing UN 3264, Corrosive liquid, acidic, inorganic, n.o.s (Aluminum Hydroxychloride) at the bottom of the piece. It was seen that during the ULD loading process, the jerrican was placed on an unseen protruding rivet causing the puncture and allowing for an estimated 236 mL to escape. No other packages were compromised because of this leak. The jerrican was contained in a salvage drum to prevent further leakage. Consignee was contacted to inform customer of the damaged package and inquire for disposition.
